properties.name: ParameterValue
properties.description: The value of the parameter. If `ParameterName` is `wlm_json_configuration`, then the maximum size of `ParameterValue` is 8000 characters.

type.description: The value of the parameter. If `ParameterName` is `wlm_json_configuration`, then the maximum size of `ParameterValue` is 8000 characters.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: ParameterGroupName
properties.description: The name of the cluster parameter group.

type.description: The name of the cluster parameter group.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description of the parameter group.

type.description: A description of the parameter group.

properties.name: ParameterGroupFamily
properties.description: The Amazon Redshift engine version to which the cluster parameter group applies. The cluster engine version determines the set of parameters.

type.description: The Amazon Redshift engine version to which the cluster parameter group applies. The cluster engine version determines the set of parameters.

properties.name: Parameters
properties.description: An array of parameters to be modified. A maximum of 20 parameters can be modified in a single request.

type.description: An array of parameters to be modified. A maximum of 20 parameters can be modified in a single request.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
